A Data Science Course Dan MacLean 2021-03-03 Section 1 About this course This is the handbook for the data science component of the TSL M.Sc in Global Plant Health. In it you will find links to the written content for each of the separate topics covered as well as the descriptions of the course assessments and projects. 1.1 Course Topics We will cover the following topics in data science 1. Introduction to Genomics 2. Data Exploration and Visualisation 3. Understanding Statistics With Linear Models 4. Introduction to Non-Frequentist Statistics 5. Introduction to Machine Learning 6. Beginning Programming 7. Literate Computation
